translations.TwoFactor Nextcloud notification: Notìfica de Nextcloud a duos fatores
translations.Authenticate using a device that is alre: Autentica·ti impreende unu dispositivu chi est giai intradu in su contu tuo
translations.Two-Factor Authentication via Nextcloud: Autenticatzione a duos fatores cun notìfica de Nextcloud
translations.Allows using any of your logged in devic: Permitit de impreare cale si siat dispositivu tuo registradu comente segundu fatore
translations.Please accept the request on one of your: Atzeta sa rechesta in unu de is dispositivos tuos registrados.
translations.You will be redirected automatically onc: T'ant a torrare a deretare in automàticu cando custa intrada at a èssere aprovada.
Su tentativu tuo de intrada est istadu refudadu.
translations.Use two-factor authentication via Nextcl: Imprea s'autenticatzione a duos fatores cun is notìficas de Nextcloud
